pairs.python_source:
@wp.kernel
        def multi_op_kernel(a: wp.array(dtype=float), b: wp.array(dtype=float), 
                           c: wp.array(dtype=float)):
            tid = wp.tid()
            x = a[tid]
            y = b[tid]
            temp = x * x + y * y
            c[tid] = wp.sqrt(temp)

@wp.kernel
        def multi_op_kernel(a: wp.array(dtype=float), b: wp.array(dtype=float), 
                           c: wp.array(dtype=float)):
            tid = wp.tid()
            x = a[tid]
            y = b[tid]
            temp = x * x + y * y
            c[tid] = wp.sqrt(temp)
